name: Hunting Classic: Bow Hunter An
description:
Hunting Classic: Bow Hunter Animal is most addictive animals hunting simulation game. This action games ultraistic 3d graphics, easy controls and amazing animations makes your playing experience interesting and joyful. Hunting animals with archery is a fun. If you want to become legend archery hunter this game completes all your hunting dreams comes true.
Features:
Super cool weapons and multiple levels
Realistic shooting arrows effects
Thrilling Soundtrack
Smooth Controls
Realistic 3D graphics and animation
